content:
Milan director Paolo Maldini has assured that he and son Daniel are feeling “fine” and expect to be rid of coronavirus “within a week”.
Paolo and Daniel were confirmed to have tested positive for COVID-19 yesterday, and the Rossoneri legend has now issued an… [+769 chars]
